subject: Lucas Sidoti - Argentina - Simracing Estructures - Peddals Interested
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team,
My name is Lucas Sidoti, i'm from Argentina.
I'm entering in the simracing market very strong with very top products
(pictures attached).
Im very interested in your peddals.
My main concerned is the shipping method as if its not via DHL or Fedex we
might have problems in Argentinean Customs.
Let me know if its possible to ship via DHL or Fedex I will buy 1 set and
after that if everything goes OK, I would like to be representative in
Argentina.

Best regards

Lucas

conversations.body_text: Hi Lucas Sidoti,    Please rest assured, we ship to Argentina via DHL or FedEx. To date, none of our shipments to Argentina have encountered any issues.
